task.title: Classroom Usage Rules
task.shortdesc: We have high standards for our classrooms. They are filled with innovative technology, and are spaces that we hope to be kept in pristine condition. We hope that you will see these rules as constructive and helpful in your time in the classroom.

step.cmd: Please do not bring food or drink into the classroom
step.info: I know gamer fuel is often necessary for effective gaming, but please consume your monster and five hour energy before entering the classroom.
If any of the residents need water or another beverage for medical reasons, please let us know and we will absolutely accommodate that need.

step.cmd: Please handle the computers with care both physically and internally
step.info: Horseplay is strictly prohibited, please make sure that your students are careful with the computers.

We understand that hackathons will likely require a number of programming downloads, please be sure that any programs downloaded from the internet are safe and secure, and will not harm the internals of the computer.

step.cmd: Be sure to keep noise levels down while other classes are in session within the building
step.info: Seeing as though you are bringing your class into the building, we anticipate that you will be using the classroom during regular school levels, please refrain from any activities that may disturb nearby classes.

Gaming events can get rowdy, and some noise is absolutely fine, but if things get too loud it may disturb other classrooms and their activities. We recommend making your reservation for after 5 o clock, or even the weekend if possible.
